headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cloud.umami.is; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.github.com https://cloud.umami.is https://api-gateway.umami.dev; img-src 'self' data:; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'
